DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct voluntary anonymous survey four separate Sacramento area family planning clinic . The investigator ask staff facility offer survey woman 18 old presenting clinic first trimester ( < 12 week gestation ) surgical abortion . Gestational age base woman believe gestational age presentation , evaluation clinic . Women understand read survey exclude . The investigator hope implement survey clinic 3-4 month reach minimum 200 woman ( base target population 600 woman receive surgical first trimester abortion two clinic 3-4 month period 95 % confidence interval ) .
DOC.brief_title: Understanding Women 's Contraceptive Expectations Time First Trimester Surgical Abortion
DOC.detailed_description: We conduct voluntary anonymous survey four separate Sacramento area family planning clinic . We introduce research project clinic staff , recruit support participation , main implementers . The survey offer woman wait room pre-procedure counseling . We include woman present clinic 18 year old planning first trimester ( < 12 week gestation ) surgical abortion . Gestational age base woman believe gestational age presentation , evaluation clinic . Women understand read survey exclude . We hope implement survey two clinic 3-4 month reach minimum 200 woman obtain adequate power study . The brief survey include cover letter explain study stress anonymity confidentiality . The survey include envelope place complete survey ; envelope seal participant drop collection bin . This process allow data collect anonymously . The survey data synthesize first descriptive analysis , follow chi-square multiple regression analysis . A statistician University California Davis Department Obstetrics Gynecology help necessary .
DOC.criteria: seek first trimester surgical abortion Women understand read survey
